## Study Designs

We adopt an appropriate study design based on the objective of the research project. We may be interested in either determining a quantity (a mean value or a percentage) or determining associations (between an exposure and an outcome). A good starting point to read up on study designs in the first article is a series of articles published in the Lancet [@grimes2002].
